nodes.text: Allen Neff was a Human male from the planet Ertegas. He came to Bespin at the age of six and followed his sister, Atril Neff, in joining the Bespin Wing Guard. Allen Neff was present in Cloud City with Lando Calrissian, Lobot, and several of his fellow Wing Guardsmen just prior to the Occupation of Bespin in 3 ABY.
